channel.title: How do i Change the EXP rate Of EVERYTHING?!
channel.description:
like every single thing gives 400 exp no matter what i do?
Please help :s

item.title: How do i Change the EXP rate Of EVERYTHING?!
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Find out your current experience rate, search your client class (client.java), and search through until you find the method that deals with the experience rates. Then remember the method so that if you have to go back to it again, you donâ€™t have to search through your entire client class again.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i Change the EXP rate Of EVERYTHING?!
